text: @BorisJohnson We have no choice. Had you not ignored or played down the threat from the first instant ,then many lives may not have been lost. NZ & such countries were right , you were wrong. You dismissed it as low risk & just wash your hands. Brexit overuled Covid19.That's a fact & u know it

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
